resources.string:
Click to the button in the upper right corner to add a new plan.
 Click to an element in the list in the left panel to choose a group.
 Long Click to an element in the list in the left pannel to open the group settings.
 Click to a spinner on the top of the screen to choose a building or floor.
 Long Click to an element in the setting of group to delete this.
 You can't view, edit and copy a downloaded map if it is private.
 You can't edit a downloaded map if it isn't editable.
